item.description: Mirza Waleed ðŸ™‚ PhD student (Geography) at the Department of Geography, Hong Kong Baptist University, Hong Kong (SAR). My research interest includes: Geographic Information Science (GIS), Remote Sensing, and Environmental Modeling. More specifically, I am interested in applying geospatial techniques, machine learning, and cloud computing (e.g., Google Earth Engine) in Hazards-Risk assessment, Environmental Change Monitoring, Floods Mapping & Automation, Land-use science, UTFVI (Urban Heat Island effect), and climate change. Besides, I’m a (5 star rated & Level-1) freelancer at Fiverr and provides Google Earth Engine based consultancy services.

How to ceate your website using Hugo & Github Pages by Mirza Waleed (24-08-2022) In this post, I will share how I made My Portfolio/Bloging Website using Github Pages and Hugo. Originally, i get inspired from this twitter thread and started preparing my website from scratch. For better understanding of whole process install following: Install VS Code Installl Hugo Create a Github account Install github extension in VS code and login to your github

Current Working Papers Earth observation for Flood Risk Assessment (Ongoing - 2022) Multi-Temporal Resilience Evaluation in Pakistan (Ongoing - 2022) Warming Cities in Pakistan: Evaluating Spatial-temporal Dynamics of Urban Thermal Field Variance Index under Rapid Urbanization (Ongoing - 2022) Submitted Papers Exploring and Predicting Thermal Field Variance in Response to Urban Growth: A Geo-information Modelling-based Spatial-temporal Assessment in the Context of Sustainable and Livable Cities (Submitted as First Author, 2022 - Egyptian Journal of Remote Sensing & Space Science)
